alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:29PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Umatilla, northwestern Union and northwestern Wallowa Counties through 200 PM PDT... At 128 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Summerville to Umatilla Reservation. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, penny size hail and brief heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meacham, Tollgate, Spout Springs, Kamela, Hilgard, Bingham Springs, Starkey and southeastern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Grande Ronde Valley; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
